Bash(Get latest time for backup file name)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat(scripts): Implement atomic file write utilities and pre-commit sync guard

Implemented atomic writing utilities (`atomicWrite.js`, `atomicWriteSafe.js`) to ensure data integrity during progress tracking updates. Drafted `scripts/lock.ps1` to manage concurrent file access.

Added a pre-commit hook (`.githooks/pre-commit`) to enforce L3 Git layer synchronization between CLAUDE.md and progress.md, fulfilling the requirement to make sync enforcement a long-term, committed feature.

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat(sync): Implement atomic file write utilities and pre-commit sync guard

Implemented atomic writing utilities (`atomicWrite.js`, `atomicWriteSafe.js`) to ensure data integrity during progress tracking updates. Drafted file sync guard logic for development environment consistency.

Added a pre-commit hook (`.githooks/pre-commit`) to enforce L3 Git layer synchronization between CLAUDE.md and progress.md, fulfilling the requirement to make sync enforcement a long-term, committed feature.

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
